name: Suspicious Minty Fruit Tea
desc: A cooling and refreshing drink. The very first sip sends your teeth practically fleeing from the onslaught of the sour taste. The light sweetness has been utterly usurped by a tyrannical astringency. Is this really fruit tea?

value.text: Increases all party members' DEF by 165 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

customize.name: Recipe: Minty Fruit Tea
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Minty Fruit Tea.

customize.name: Mint
customize.desc: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

customize.name: Sunsettia
customize.desc: A plump fruit, beautiful like the sunset, that is abundant across all of Teyvat. It has a curious, sweet aroma and is able to energize an individual.

customize.name: Berry
customize.desc: Small, brightly-colored fruit. They can be found everywhere, and the taste of them wipes the fatigue of a long journey away.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Minty Fruit Tea
customize.desc: A cooling and refreshing drink. The invigorating tea and the sweet-sour taste of fruit blend together and energize your taste buds, and before you know it, you've already drained your entire cup.

customize.name: Delicious Minty Fruit Tea
customize.desc: A cooling and refreshing drink. The sweet flavor of the tea combines with light, clear floral notes on one hand, and tangles with a dash of fruity on the other, filling your mouth and throat with their aroma. Wait a moment â€” why are there only ice cubes left in the cup?
